events.name: Learn about Procedural Content Generation with Clojure with Mike Anderson
events.description:
Functional programming provides a powerful set of tools for procedural generation of content for games, art and product design. In this workshop we will explore the use of the Clojure programming language to create a wide range of visual effects, from game textures to procedurally generated animations. 


Participation This workshop takes place at the FOSSASIA OpenTechSummit 2016 in the Science Centre Singapore. Tickets are available here: http://www.eventnook.com/event/fossasia/register Daily tickets cost 7 SGD and include a lunchbox. Website: http://2016.fossasia.org 


About Mike Anderson Mike is a data scientist, technology consultant and open source enthusiast. Formally a strategy consultant at McKinsey&Co., he now runs Datacraft, a Singapore-based startup focused on data science and machine learning. Mike is a prolific open source contributor under the tag "mikera", focusing mainly on Java and Clojure libraries for data science and art.  Web  Github  Twitter
events.location: Singapore Science Centre, Lewis Lab (Level 3),  15 Science Centre Road, 609081 Singapore, Singapore

events.name: Singapore Shapeways Meetup
events.description:
It's been a while so here's the next round of meetups for us to all gather and hangout while geeking over models and 3d printed projects projects! As always, this meetup is open to one and all, regardless of whether you may have used Shapeways or not. Come join the fun and see what amazing pieces can be done with Shapeways!. Also,  when you're here with us, do go crazy snapping pics of the stuff! Do also share photos on Instagram, Twitter, etc, tagging Shapeways using @Shapeways or #Shapeways! See you all! =D 



Held in conjunction with Singapore 3D Printing Meetup (http://www.meetup.com/SG3DPMeetup/events/229174151/)
events.location: Funbie Studios, Funan DigitaLife Mall, Singapore
